title: Pixel 4a camera lagging. Camera is unusable
content:
I have this phone from 2 weeks and after an update the camera app is lagging and unusable. 
I wait 10 seconds to open the app camera and then the objective  is lagging very much. 
The camera is unusable in this way.

I've tried some solutions I've found in the help center, but without any help:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/70162818?hl=en
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6306624?hl=en

Thank you
